sense.def:
Transport
so vozila, v katerih se prevažamo.

seg.quote: It is easier if you have your own transport.
Why can't he use public transport?

sense.def:
Transport
je prevažanje blaga ali oseb iz enega kraja v drugega.

seg.quote: The essential means of transport for heavy equipment remained the railway.

sense.def:
To transport goods or people from one place to another
pomeni z vozilom prepeljati blago ali osebe iz enega kraja v drugega.

seg.quote: The goods were transported to East Africa.
